types.name: Account
types.description: Account is an Ethereum account at a particular block.

fields.name: address
fields.description: Address is the address owning the account.

fields.name: balance
fields.description: Balance is the balance of the account, in wei.

fields.name: transactionCount
fields.description:
TransactionCount is the number of transactions sent from this account,
or in the case of a contract, the number of contracts created. Otherwise
known as the nonce.

fields.name: code
fields.description:
Code contains the smart contract code for this account, if the account
is a (non-self-destructed) contract.

fields.name: storage
fields.description:
Storage provides access to the storage of a contract account, indexed
by its 32 byte slot identifier.

types.name: Address
types.description: Address is a 20 byte Ethereum address, represented as 0x-prefixed hexadecimal.

types.name: BigInt
types.description:
BigInt is a large integer. Input is accepted as either a JSON number or as a string.
Strings may be either decimal or 0x-prefixed hexadecimal. Output values are all
0x-prefixed hexadecimal.

fields.name: number
fields.description: Number is the number of this block, starting at 0 for the genesis block.

fields.name: hash
fields.description: Hash is the block hash of this block.

fields.name: parent
fields.description: Parent is the parent block of this block.

fields.name: nonce
fields.description: Nonce is the block nonce, an 8 byte sequence determined by the miner.

fields.name: transactionsRoot
fields.description: TransactionsRoot is the keccak256 hash of the root of the trie of transactions in this block.

fields.name: transactionCount
fields.description:
TransactionCount is the number of transactions in this block. if
transactions are not available for this block, this field will be null.

fields.name: stateRoot
fields.description: StateRoot is the keccak256 hash of the state trie after this block was processed.

fields.name: receiptsRoot
fields.description: ReceiptsRoot is the keccak256 hash of the trie of transaction receipts in this block.

fields.name: miner
fields.description: Miner is the account that mined this block.

fields.name: extraData
fields.description: ExtraData is an arbitrary data field supplied by the miner.

fields.name: gasLimit
fields.description: GasLimit is the maximum amount of gas that was available to transactions in this block.

fields.name: gasUsed
fields.description: GasUsed is the amount of gas that was used executing transactions in this block.

fields.name: baseFeePerGas
fields.description: BaseFeePerGas is the fee perunit of gas burned by the protocol in this block.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Timestamp is the unix timestamp at which this block was mined.

fields.name: logsBloom
fields.description:
LogsBloom is a bloom filter that can be used to check if a block may
contain log entries matching a filter.

fields.name: mixHash
fields.description: MixHash is the hash that was used as an input to the PoW process.

fields.name: difficulty
fields.description: Difficulty is a measure of the difficulty of mining this block.

fields.name: totalDifficulty
fields.description:
TotalDifficulty is the sum of all difficulty values up to and including
this block.

fields.name: ommerCount
fields.description:
OmmerCount is the number of ommers (AKA uncles) associated with this
block. If ommers are unavailable, this field will be null.

fields.name: ommers
fields.description:
Ommers is a list of ommer (AKA uncle) blocks associated with this block.
If ommers are unavailable, this field will be null. Depending on your
node, the transactions, transactionAt, transactionCount, ommers,
ommerCount and ommerAt fields may not be available on any ommer blocks.

fields.name: ommerAt
fields.description:
OmmerAt returns the ommer (AKA uncle) at the specified index. If ommers
are unavailable, or the index is out of bounds, this field will be null.

fields.name: ommerHash
fields.description:
OmmerHash is the keccak256 hash of all the ommers (AKA uncles)
associated with this block.

fields.name: transactions
fields.description:
Transactions is a list of transactions associated with this block. If
transactions are unavailable for this block, this field will be null.

fields.name: transactionAt
fields.description:
TransactionAt returns the transaction at the specified index. If
transactions are unavailable for this block, or if the index is out of
bounds, this field will be null.

fields.name: logs
fields.description: Logs returns a filtered set of logs from this block.

fields.name: account
fields.description: Account fetches an Ethereum account at the current block's state.

fields.name: call
fields.description: Call executes a local call operation at the current block's state.

fields.name: estimateGas
fields.description:
EstimateGas estimates the amount of gas that will be required for
successful execution of a transaction at the current block's state.

types.name: BlockFilterCriteria
types.description:
BlockFilterCriteria encapsulates log filter criteria for a filter applied
to a single block.

inputFields.name: addresses
inputFields.description:
Addresses is list of addresses that are of interest. If this list is
empty, results will not be filtered by address.

inputFields.name: topics
inputFields.description:
Topics list restricts matches to particular event topics. Each event has a list
of topics. Topics matches a prefix of that list. An empty element array matches any
topic. Non-empty elements represent an alternative that matches any of the
contained topics.

Examples:
 - [] or nil          matches any topic list
 - [[A]]              matches topic A in first position
 - [[], [B]]          matches any topic in first position, B in second position
 - [[A], [B]]         matches topic A in first position, B in second position
 - [[A, B]], [C, D]]  matches topic (A OR B) in first position, (C OR D) in second position

types.name: Bytes
types.description:
Bytes is an arbitrary length binary string, represented as 0x-prefixed hexadecimal.
An empty byte string is represented as '0x'. Byte strings must have an even number of hexadecimal nybbles.

types.name: Bytes32
types.description: Bytes32 is a 32 byte binary string, represented as 0x-prefixed hexadecimal.

types.name: CallData
types.description:
CallData represents the data associated with a local contract call.
All fields are optional.

inputFields.name: from
inputFields.description: From is the address making the call.

inputFields.name: to
inputFields.description: To is the address the call is sent to.

inputFields.name: gas
inputFields.description: Gas is the amount of gas sent with the call.

inputFields.name: gasPrice
inputFields.description: GasPrice is the price, in wei, offered for each unit of gas.

inputFields.name: maxFeePerGas
inputFields.description: MaxFeePerGas is the maximum fee per gas offered, in wei.

inputFields.name: maxPriorityFeePerGas
inputFields.description: MaxPriorityFeePerGas is the maximum miner tip per gas offered, in wei.

inputFields.name: value
inputFields.description: Value is the value, in wei, sent along with the call.

inputFields.name: data
inputFields.description: Data is the data sent to the callee.

types.name: CallResult
types.description: CallResult is the result of a local call operation.

fields.name: data
fields.description: Data is the return data of the called contract.

fields.name: gasUsed
fields.description: GasUsed is the amount of gas used by the call, after any refunds.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Status is the result of the call - 1 for success or 0 for failure.

types.name: FilterCriteria
types.description: FilterCriteria encapsulates log filter criteria for searching log entries.

inputFields.name: fromBlock
inputFields.description:
FromBlock is the block at which to start searching, inclusive. Defaults
to the latest block if not supplied.

inputFields.name: toBlock
inputFields.description:
ToBlock is the block at which to stop searching, inclusive. Defaults
to the latest block if not supplied.

inputFields.name: addresses
inputFields.description:
Addresses is a list of addresses that are of interest. If this list is
empty, results will not be filtered by address.

inputFields.name: topics
inputFields.description:
Topics list restricts matches to particular event topics. Each event has a list
of topics. Topics matches a prefix of that list. An empty element array matches any
topic. Non-empty elements represent an alternative that matches any of the
contained topics.

Examples:
 - [] or nil          matches any topic list
 - [[A]]              matches topic A in first position
 - [[], [B]]          matches any topic in first position, B in second position
 - [[A], [B]]         matches topic A in first position, B in second position
 - [[A, B]], [C, D]]  matches topic (A OR B) in first position, (C OR D) in second position

types.name: Log
types.description: Log is an Ethereum event log.

fields.name: index
fields.description: Index is the index of this log in the block.

fields.name: account
fields.description:
Account is the account which generated this log - this will always
be a contract account.

fields.name: topics
fields.description: Topics is a list of 0-4 indexed topics for the log.

fields.name: data
fields.description: Data is unindexed data for this log.

fields.name: transaction
fields.description: Transaction is the transaction that generated this log entry.

types.name: Long
types.description: Long is a 64 bit unsigned integer.

fields.name: sendRawTransaction
fields.description: SendRawTransaction sends an RLP-encoded transaction to the network.

types.name: Pending
types.description: Pending represents the current pending state.

fields.name: transactionCount
fields.description: TransactionCount is the number of transactions in the pending state.

fields.name: transactions
fields.description: Transactions is a list of transactions in the current pending state.

fields.name: account
fields.description: Account fetches an Ethereum account for the pending state.

fields.name: call
fields.description: Call executes a local call operation for the pending state.

fields.name: estimateGas
fields.description:
EstimateGas estimates the amount of gas that will be required for
successful execution of a transaction for the pending state.

fields.name: block
fields.description:
Block fetches an Ethereum block by number or by hash. If neither is
supplied, the most recent known block is returned.

fields.name: blocks
fields.description:
Blocks returns all the blocks between two numbers, inclusive. If
to is not supplied, it defaults to the most recent known block.

fields.name: pending
fields.description: Pending returns the current pending state.

fields.name: transaction
fields.description: Transaction returns a transaction specified by its hash.

fields.name: logs
fields.description: Logs returns log entries matching the provided filter.

fields.name: gasPrice
fields.description:
GasPrice returns the node's estimate of a gas price sufficient to
ensure a transaction is mined in a timely fashion.

fields.name: maxPriorityFeePerGas
fields.description:
MaxPriorityFeePerGas returns the node's estimate of a gas tip sufficient
to ensure a transaction is mined in a timely fashion.

fields.name: syncing
fields.description: Syncing returns information on the current synchronisation state.

fields.name: chainID
fields.description: ChainID returns the current chain ID for transaction replay protection.

types.name: SyncState
types.description: SyncState contains the current synchronisation state of the client.

fields.name: startingBlock
fields.description: StartingBlock is the block number at which synchronisation started.

fields.name: currentBlock
fields.description: CurrentBlock is the point at which synchronisation has presently reached.

fields.name: highestBlock
fields.description: HighestBlock is the latest known block number.

fields.name: hash
fields.description: Hash is the hash of this transaction.

fields.name: nonce
fields.description: Nonce is the nonce of the account this transaction was generated with.

fields.name: index
fields.description:
Index is the index of this transaction in the parent block. This will
be null if the transaction has not yet been mined.

fields.name: from
fields.description:
From is the account that sent this transaction - this will always be
an externally owned account.

fields.name: to
fields.description:
To is the account the transaction was sent to. This is null for
contract-creating transactions.

fields.name: value
fields.description: Value is the value, in wei, sent along with this transaction.

fields.name: gasPrice
fields.description: GasPrice is the price offered to miners for gas, in wei per unit.

fields.name: maxFeePerGas
fields.description: MaxFeePerGas is the maximum fee per gas offered to include a transaction, in wei.

fields.name: maxPriorityFeePerGas
fields.description: MaxPriorityFeePerGas is the maximum miner tip per gas offered to include a transaction, in wei.

fields.name: gas
fields.description: Gas is the maximum amount of gas this transaction can consume.

fields.name: inputData
fields.description: InputData is the data supplied to the target of the transaction.

fields.name: block
fields.description:
Block is the block this transaction was mined in. This will be null if
the transaction has not yet been mined.

fields.name: status
fields.description:
Status is the return status of the transaction. This will be 1 if the
transaction succeeded, or 0 if it failed (due to a revert, or due to
running out of gas). If the transaction has not yet been mined, this
field will be null.

fields.name: gasUsed
fields.description:
GasUsed is the amount of gas that was used processing this transaction.
If the transaction has not yet been mined, this field will be null.

fields.name: cumulativeGasUsed
fields.description:
CumulativeGasUsed is the total gas used in the block up to and including
this transaction. If the transaction has not yet been mined, this field
will be null.

fields.name: effectiveGasPrice
fields.description:
EffectiveGasPrice is actual value per gas deducted from the sender's
account. Before EIP-1559, this is equal to the transaction's gas price.
After EIP-1559, it is baseFeePerGas + min(maxFeePerGas - baseFeePerGas,
maxPriorityFeePerGas). Legacy transactions and EIP-2930 transactions are
coerced into the EIP-1559 format by setting both maxFeePerGas and
maxPriorityFeePerGas as the transaction's gas price.

fields.name: createdContract
fields.description:
CreatedContract is the account that was created by a contract creation
transaction. If the transaction was not a contract creation transaction,
or it has not yet been mined, this field will be null.

fields.name: logs
fields.description:
Logs is a list of log entries emitted by this transaction. If the
transaction has not yet been mined, this field will be null.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Envelope transaction support
